description: This Dart file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages an in-memory list of Note objects for a Flutter application. It provides methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve notes, and notifies listeners on changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages a list of Note objects, providing methods to manipulate and access notes, while notifying listeners on changes.

methods.name: notes
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of notes.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID; returns null if not found.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the beginning of the list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note by matching ID; notifies listeners if update occurs.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note by ID; notifies listeners if removal occurs.
